title: Guns and Butter - 2009 Dec 09 [sebaygo1]
description:
.

Guns and Butter
Wednesday, 09 December 2009

[sebaygo1]




After a week's absence, Guns and Butter returns with "Obama Declares War on Pakistan," featuring Webster Griffin Tarpley.  

Discussion of Obama's West Point speech; the escalation of the wars in Central Asia, specifically Pakistan and Uzbekistan; what the war policy is and why; Blackwater and black ops; India and Kashmir.
 <a href="
http://www.tarpley.net/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.tarpley.net/</a> <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Webster_Tarpley" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Webster_Tarpley</a>





================================================

"Guns & Butter" investigates the relationships among capitalism, militarism and politics. Maintaining a radical perspective in the aftermath of the September 11th attacks, "Guns & Butter: The Economics of Politics" reports on who wins and who loses when the economic resources of civil society are diverted toward global corporatization, war, and the furtherance of a national security state.

Live on KPFA at 01:00 PM Pacific Time: Wednesdays
This program alternates with other programs in this time slot. See the KFPA Program Grid for more details.

================================================

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume support or endorsement on my
 part of all contents.

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
